channel.title: Need help with my skills and exp
channel.description:
how can i get the skill exp to update as they level?
like when i'm gaining exp the exp stays the same then if i re-log it updates
(new explanation)
ok yeah i thought that would happen....
um when i hold my mouse over a skill as im leveling it, the level nor the exp change
its like they dont update what the player sees
but then if i re-log it will show the new exp and skill
